about_the_game:
War Job is a silly team fighting game using silly weapons, Doctors using needles, chefs using pans, artists using pencils and more than 26 other professions with different crazy weapons.
The game has more than 26 different characters representing many different professions for you to choose from. Each character has different quirky attacks that create CRAZY, funny and dramatic battles.
To win, you need to be agile, build the right strategy and coordinate well with your teammates
*** Outstanding features ***
- Tactical PVP
- Fighting characters with different strengths and unique attack skills
- Many maps to fight, lively and fun sounds
- Characters with balanced strength
- Fight online with friends
- Play alone or team up with 2 to 10 players together

- Different professions have their own silly weapons and weird skills
+ Farmers unleash pigs and cows

+ Office workers attack with laptops and chairs

+ Workers push wheelbarrows to shoot nails
+ Chefs use frying pans and can cook
+ Artists throw pencils
+ Policemen lock opponents in jail and shoot guns
+ Doctors throw needles and can heal teammates
+ Bank robbers throw bags of money at faces
+ Fighters with fists
+ Firefighters spray water
+ Scientists spread poison and coronavirus
+ Cleaners throw shit
+ Gardeners fly and throw bombs
+ Soldiers carry suicide grenades
+ Singers attack with voice and sound
+ Clown attack with balloons
+ Karate fighters with hand strikes
+ Runners dash and throw shoes
+ Farmer unleashes herd of pets
+ Musicians attack with trumpets
+ Bandleaders attack with sound systems
+ Tiktoker dancing and liking
+ Housewife with vacuum cleaner and everything in the kitchen
+ President escorted by tanks and planes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Video Card with DX11 support, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: If there was a war between professions, who would win? Police, chef, farmer or other professions? War Job is a silly party game with silly weapons, choose your profession and join the funny war. Can be played alone or online with 2 to 10 friends
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Indonesian, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Arabic
